moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bc4 Nf6: This was the Starting Position of the tournament
moves.4... exd4 5. O-O Be7: ? Interesting, trying to negate a possible 6.Bg5
moves.6. Ng5 O-O 7. c3: Trying to free my knight, one of the main Ideas of the Max Lange Attack.
moves.7... dxc3 8. Nxc3 d6: ?? Blocks his bishop in and lets his other one out.
moves.9. Qc2: I brought the queen there to apply more pressure on h7. Just gave him a tempo for the time being.
moves.9... Nd4 10. Qd3 c5: Defending the knight but allowing me to execute my plan.
moves.11. e5 dxe5 12. Nd5: The knight is indirectly pinned. If it moves, game over. And one of the main ideas in chess is attack the pinned piece.
moves.12... Nxd5 13. Qxh7#: Corme falls into the trap and this goes to show, Material doesn't matter. Feel free to comment!
